description: Acute freeze response triggered by sudden fear spike with low determination to act
actor_description: My body goes still without asking me. Moving feels like choosing the wrong option. For a second I hear my own breathing too clearly—then I realize I've been holding it. Cold prickles rise along my arms; my limbs feel heavy.
description_text: {actor} freezes—eyes wide, posture locked as if bracing for something they can't dodge.

alternate_descriptions.auditory: A sudden hush, like someone stopped breathing mid-thought.
